Set Global Catppuccin Flavor

Source: R/zzz.R
set_catppuccin_flavor.Rd

Sets the preferred Catppuccin flavor for the R session, so subsequent calls to scales or themes can omit the flavor argument if they read this option.

Usage

set_catppuccin_flavor(flavor)

Arguments

flavor

Flavor name to store (e.g. "mocha" or "mocha_cb"). No validation is applied.

Value

Invisibly returns the previous value of the option.

On this page
